DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Dimension Standard Operating Procedure Variation Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that comments or describes the issues that resulted in the deviation from the biospecimen tissue collection and preservation standard operating procedure.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biospecimen Dimension Standard Operating Procedure Variation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._The magnitude of something in a particular direction, especially length or width or height._An established procedure to be followed in carrying out a given operation or in a given situation._An alteration or difference from a norm or standard.
